bioAsHtml:
Daniel is a Software Engineer from Spain, with more than fifteen years of experience as a Java dev in the web and data integration fields.

He has always had a passion for finding the right tools to solve his technical challenges and, if not found, just go developing them. Unfortunately for his sleep time, this has lead him to author and publish several different Java open source projects along the last years, which he still leads with different grades of success. From his beloved creature the Thymeleaf template engine to the popular Jasypt encryption library, auxiliary tools like AttoParser or Unbescape, and other minor projects like JavaTuples, op4j, javaRuntype or JavaGalician.

Wherever you find him, please fuel him with caffeine.

acceptedTalks.title: Thymeleaf: bridging the gap between designers and devs with server-side templates
